summary: No More MIne Pests changes certain mines around skyrim to prevent enemies from spawning in them once a quest npc acknowledges that you have cleared them out, thus preventing these enemies from killing friendly NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
No More MIne Pests changes certain mines around skyrim to prevent enemies from spawning in them once a quest npc acknowledges that you have cleared them out, thus preventing these enemies from killing friendly NPCs.

[b][u]Changes:[/b][/u]
[list]
[*]Changed Soljund\'s Sinkhole quest to prevent Draugr from spawning after completion of the quest. The \"Sinkhole\" has also been blocked off.
[*]Changed Red Belly Cave quest to prevent Spiders from spawning after completion of the quest.
[*]Changed Kolskeggr Mine quest to prevent Forswarn from spawning after completion of the quest.
[/list]


If you have already cleared any of these quests, you must reset the quest.


Please endorse my mod if you enjoyed it, and please post any comments/suggestions to help me make it even better!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Better Soljund\'s Sinkhole is also on the Skyrim Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=71927935]Here[/url].[/b]

Also, check out my other mods!

author: eagledude4
